name: Occult: Satanic interrogation
summary:
Are you Innocent or Guilty? A story of sinister magic, play and makes decisions in this evil adventure, a dark game with scary story where you will have to prove your innocence, or you will be condemned guilty in hell.
Can you prove your innocence?. in this mystifying interrogation game?
Where you will find an esoteric and dystopian world where you will have to demonstrate your innocence.
Or will you perish in a dark, occult interrogation?
